budgetCategories.name: Public Schools
budgetCategories.description: Transfer to Fairfax County Public Schools for operating and debt service support

budgetCategories.name: Public Safety
budgetCategories.description: Police, Fire & Rescue, Sheriff, and emergency services

budgetCategories.name: Health & Human Services
budgetCategories.description: Community services, family services, public health, and social services

budgetCategories.name: Employee Fringe Benefits
budgetCategories.description: Retirement, health insurance, and other employee benefits

budgetCategories.name: County Debt Service
budgetCategories.description: Principal and interest on county-issued bonds

budgetCategories.name: Community Development & Transportation
budgetCategories.description: Housing, transit, and community development programs

budgetCategories.name: Parks & Libraries
budgetCategories.description: Park authority and public library system

budgetCategories.name: General Government & Central Services
budgetCategories.description: Judicial administration, legislative-executive, IT, finance, and other central services

revenueSources.name: Real Estate Taxes
revenueSources.description: Tax on residential and commercial real property assessed at 100% of fair market value

revenueSources.name: Personal Property Taxes
revenueSources.description: Tax on vehicles and business tangible personal property, net of state relief

revenueSources.name: Other Local Taxes
revenueSources.description: Local sales tax share plus BPOL, meals, transient occupancy, and utility taxes

revenueSources.name: State & Federal Revenue
revenueSources.description: Aid and reimbursements from the Commonwealth of Virginia and the federal government

revenueSources.name: Charges for Services
revenueSources.description: Fees for services such as EMS transport, court services, clerk fees, and program charges

revenueSources.name: Other Revenue
revenueSources.description: Fines, forfeitures, permits, licenses, interest earnings, and miscellaneous revenue
